thread.title: What does Ellen DeGeneres have planned for Lawrence Monday?
thread.title_full: What does Ellen DeGeneres have planned for Lawrence Monday?

title: What does Ellen DeGeneres have planned for Lawrence Monday?
text:
What does Ellen DeGeneres have planned for Lawrence Monday? Talk show host hints Jayhawks need to bring A-game Published 4:56 PM CDT Oct 25, 2015 
What does Ellen DeGeneres have planned for Lawrence on Monday? Related New faces help drive Royals' return... 
In a series of tweets this weekend, DeGeneres hinted something big was going to happen Monday around noon on the University of Kansas campus. 
Her first tweet, sent Saturday, said, 'Hey, everybody at the University of Kansas, if you're as excited as I am about the World Series, I hope you're free on Monday." Big things planned for the University of Kansas tomorrow. You free around noon, Jayhawks? I hope you bring your A-game. @KUNews â€” Ellen DeGeneres (@TheEllenShow) October 25, 2015 
A day later, she followed with "Big things planned for the University of Kansas tomorrow. You free around noon, Jayhawks? I hope you bring your A-game." 
Vice chancellor Tim Caboni tweeted, "Looking forward to having @TheEllenShow on campus Monday. Hope you are practicing your dance moves." 
No other details were available Sunday afternoon. 
It wouldn't be the first time Ellen planned something in the Kansas City area during the World Series. In 2014, DeGeneres surprised two Kearney Royals fans with a trip to see the Royals play the Giants in San Francisco. 
"The Ellen DeGeneres Show" airs weekdays at 4 p.m. on KMBC.
